channel.title: Optimize-OS SPAWN PK GR8 COMBAT - Don't let your enemy escape - the beginning -
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Hello Guest![/b][/u]
Optimize-OS will be first released for beta kind of thing however we won't reset your characterfiles or take server down for maintenance. We will let you guys PK while we fix bugs that you find.
[u]Links[/u] [url=http://www.optimize-os.com]Website[/url] [url=http://www.optimize-os.com/optimize-os.jar]Play Now ( direct download )[/url]
[u]Features[/u]
-Perfect Item switching -Very advanced combat system, balanced for each style. -Some OSRS items -Dicing system -Duel arena staking ( shortly ) -Full PvP World -Projectile clipping meaning you can hug objects while you NH hybrid, objects such as trees etc. -Great economy system for spawn servers.
[u]Media[/u]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/ehh.png[/img]
Note: We have currently no graphics so the thread may look poor, we will be getting some shortly and will update this thread by then.
C ya online![/center]
